title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.8 - Investment and certain other subsidiaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.8 - Investment and certain other subsidiaries

State Regulations

Annual and quarterly statements filed with the superintendent by parent corporations holding subsidiaries under section
1704 (a)
of the Insurance Law shall have attached thereto exhibits describing the investments held by such subsidiaries in the same degree of detail that would be required, if such investments were held directly by the parent corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-2.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
